Class tripleplay.ui.Slider

Added Constructors
Slider() Constructs a new slider with empty range and zero value.
 

Removed Methods
Slider setThumb(Image) Sets an image to use as a thumb.
Slider setThumb(Image, float, float) Sets an image to use as a thumb, with the given hot spot coordinates.
Slider setWidth(float) Sets the unstretched width of this slider, in pixels.
 

Added Methods
SignalView<Slider> clicked() A signal that is emitted when the user has released their finger/pointer after having started adjusting the slider.
 

Removed Fields
float DEFAULT_WIDTH The width of an unstretched slider.
 

Added Fields
Style<Background> BAR_BACKGROUND The background that renders the bar (defaults to a black rectangle).
Style<Float> BAR_HEIGHT The height of the bar.
Style<Float> BAR_WIDTH The width of the bar of an unstretched slider.
Style<Image> THUMB_IMAGE The image to use for the slider thumb.
Style<IPoint> THUMB_ORIGIN The origin of the thumb image (used to center the thumb image over the tray).
Value<Range> range The range of the slider.
